itemDescription: Welsh politician and MP for Cardiff Central (born 1966)

wikipedia_page.main: Joanna Meriel Stevens (born 6 September 1966) is a Welsh Labour Party politician serving as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Cardiff Central since the May 2015 general election. Stevens also serves as the Shadow Secretary of State for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport and sits on the National Executive Committee on behalf of the shadow frontbench.
